title: Blood Moon and Sashimi Akali, small ideas on the recalls.
body:
I expected a little more on the Blood Moon Akali recall, I like it, but I wish it had some more features. For example, she put on her mask and melts into blood, to reappear at the fountain, or she put on her mask and a blood portal forms and sucks her in, then pulls her up at the fountain. A mixture of both, she is sucked in, and the portal transforms into her at the fountain.

For Sashimi she should be making sushi and return to the fountain when she finishes the sushi.

replies.body:
Blood Moon is getting a unique recall, but it's not going to be ready for Akali's launch this week. Sashimi will not get a unique recall, since it's a 750 skin, and they do not get unique recall animations.

That said, Sashimi COULD do with like a picture of a sushi roll on her little talisman she pulls out, since that's just a small texture thing.
